favourite.article: "I Just enjoyed singing this hymn to the Father with all those members of His Body who call on the Lord out of a pure heart during the time of the worship of the Father at the Lord's Table in the church in Lake Forest, CA. I'm so blessed to attend the Lord's Table with the church in Lake Forest"
Ammmmeeeennnnn for all hymnal songs. :)))))) Thank You, Lord.
I needed this song, which is a prayer! Thank You Lord for the loving sister who sent it to me this cold winter morning!
Such a touching way to enjoy the Father and be revived every morning.
AMEN, Hallelujah.

Brother Howard Higashi was a gift to the Body. Thank You Lord Jesus for this lover of Christ!

Someone sent me this link, and I bought a tape on it called, "Lord, Take My Heart," with lots of Higashi songs on it. I love them. http://www.livingstreambooks.com/servlet/the-Hymns-cln-Music--dsh--Singing/Categories

best song ever!
Abba Father! How sweet to call Abba's name! Amen.
OH ABBA FATHER! HOW SWEET IS YOUR NAME TO PRAISE! OH ABBA FATHER! PRAISE THE LORD!

OH ABBA FATHER!!! WHAT A SWEET CRY FROM WITHIN. WHAT AN EXPERIENCE!!!!! THANK YOU FATHER FOR YOUR SON AND FOR THE MANY MEMBERS WHO HELP US TO ENJOY YOU THROUGH THE HYMNS WITH A SPIRIT OF PRAYER. WE LOVE YOU AND FOR EVER WILL CRY ABBA FATHER!!!!!!!
I have never felt so sweet to cry Abba's name until I hear this song. Thank the Lord for giving us Howard Higashi, a dear member of the Body.
Abba Father! such a sweet name. Hallelujah to You our dear Abba Father!!!
Oh Lord Jesus.. I LOVE SO MUCH.

Our creator is so deeply relational with His creation, that He gave Himself the name, Father. Abba Father...best translation is,"Daddy". We all have earthly fathers. Some of us are lucky enough to have had a daddy, who sweetly loved us and, through their faithfulness toward us, launched us into the world. Our heavenly Father, with the Holy Spirit, birthed us into His eternal family, as His beloved children. Our fathers here may, or may not have loved us, but our Heavenly Father loves us now and into the eternal dwellings He and Christ is preparing for us. How great is our salvation.
Thank you Father, for sending Him. O Abba Father we love you. Amen!

Abba Father is the sweetest and most deep experience I have of the Triune God. After calling on the Lord one day, I was led to cry from deep within, "Abba Father". The Lord still has so much to accomplish so He can return. In my prayer to the Lord, in showing the Lord what has not been done, He was so sweet to lead me to cry to Him in this way! Abba Father! Abba, we Love You! Abba we need You! Get what you are after in me.
Whenever I call Abba Father, I sense the very sweetness of the Lord within me. Oh Abba Father...We love you so much, Amen!
This song make me so close to our dear Abba Father. Abba Father we love You. Amen.

"ABBA FATHER" That's what we call to the Lord Who is the creator, the Everlasting Father and the Almighty God of all. The song was impress me so much. HALLELUJAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
